A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a huge Star Wars fan.

Here is what I dislike about The Last Jedi:
  - Luke was indeed the last jedi\, Ray did not become a jedi by having little to none training at all
  - Luke did not read the judi books? Really\, he sit on a lonely island and he did not find time to read the sacred jedi books?
  - You don't kill sith masters like Sonke by mind tricks which can be read by a non-force sensitive 10 years old kids :(
  - Without training\, Luke was barely able to lift a rock or R2D2\, Ray was able to lift a mountain!!!
  - there are so much more (hate the bombing scene) but I feel too irritated to write about this.
